title: Pixel 3a Mic is broken
content:
Brought Pixel 3a in the first week of the launch but in the matter of few weeks phone mic stopped working. (Calling someone or vice versa they weren't able to hear me, unless i connect my phone with earphones or turn on Speaker and talk), Tried to restart didn't work or nothing worked.
Apparently its the chip in the phone is repaired, UBreakIFix service center had it fixed.
